parameters.name: DeadEndDate
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query based on the time when domain names expire.

parameters.name: DeadStartDate
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query based on the time when domain names expire.

parameters.name: DomainType
parameters.description:
The type of the domain name. Valid values:

GUOJI, TONGYONG, GUONEI, NAME, and WEIBO.

parameters.name: EndDate
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query based on the time when domain names expire.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the error message to return if the request fails. Valid values:

zh: Chinese. en: English.

parameters.name: OrderByType
parameters.description:
The order in which you want to sort the queried domain names. Valid values:

ASC: ascending order. DESC: descending order.

parameters.name: OrderKeyType
parameters.description:
The field by which domain names to be queried are sorted. Valid values:

REGDATE: registration time. DEADDATE: expiration time. CREATEDATE: creation time.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: ProductDomainType
parameters.description:
The product type of the domain name. Valid values:

New gTLD, gTLD, ccTLD, and other.

parameters.name: QueryType
parameters.description:
The type of the query. Valid values:

1: renewal. 2: redemption. 4: transfer.

parameters.name: RegEndDate
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query based on the time when domain names were registered.

parameters.name: RegStartDate
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query based on the time when domain names were registered.

parameters.name: StartDate
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query based on the time when domain names expire.

parameters.name: UserClientIp
parameters.description: The IP address of the client. Set the value to 127.0.0.1.
